text: The 2000 LG Chinese Football Super Cup (Chinese: LG杯2000年度中国足球超霸杯赛) was the 6th Chinese Football Super Cup, contested by Chinese Jia-A League 2000 winners Dalian Shide and 2000 Chinese FA Cup winners Chongqing Lifan. Dalian Shide won their 2nd title after winning 4–1.王鹏上演帽子戏法 实德4-1胜力帆顺利捧得超霸杯 == Match details == {| width="100%" |valign="top"| |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||22 || Chen Dong |- |CB ||27 || Sun Jihai |- |CB ||12 || Wang Sheng |- |CB ||16 || Ji Mingyi |- |DM ||3 || Adilson |- |RM ||6 || Li Ming || || |- |LM ||11 || Yan Song |- |AM ||8 || Wang Peng |- |AM ||10 || Miodrag Pantelić || || |- |FW ||9 || Hao Haidong || || |- |FW ||10 || Orlando |- |colspan=3|Substitutes used: |- |MF ||24 || Zhang Yalin || || |- |MF ||14 || Hu Zhaojun || || |- |DF ||5 || Xu Hong || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Milorad Kosanović |} |valign="top" width="45%"| {| style="font- size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK||1|| Fu Bin |- |CB||3|| Jiang Bin || || |- |CB||12|| Sun Qing |- |CB||18|| Jiang Hui |- |MF||5|| Jiang Feng |- |MF||6|| Zhao Lichun || || |- |MF||15|| Luo Di |- |MF||21|| Wei Xin |- |MF||26|| Huang Yunfeng || || |- |MF||29|| Liu Jingbiao |- |FW||11|| Mark Williams |- |colspan=3|Substitutes used: |- |MF ||8 || Xu Xin || || |- |MF ||7 || Ma Ningbo || || |- |DF ||4 || Zhou Lin || || |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Lee Jang-soo |} |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; margin: 0 auto; width: 20%" |- !Chinese Football Super Cup 2000 Winners |- |Dalian Shide Second title |} == References == Category:2000 in Chinese football 2000
